test.instr: (:ins (:cons_not (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X human)))) (:cons_notnot (:info (on X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X red) (sort Y sofa)))) (:cons_not (:task (takeout X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X black) (sort Y washmachine)))) (:info (on X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X black) (sort Y microwave))) (:info (on X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X red) (sort Y teapoy))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (sort Y refrigerator))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X blue) (sort Y washmachine))) (:task (close X) (:cond (sort X refrigerator))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X yellow) (sort Y washmachine))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (sort Y refrigerator))) )
test.nl: Do not go to the human. The red remotecontrol must be on the sofa. Do not take out a book which is washmachine from the washmachine. There is black remotecontrol on the microwave. There is the red book on the teapoy. Put a book in the refrigerator. Put the blue cup on the washmachine. Close the door of the refrigerator. Put the yellow bottle in the washmachine. Put a remotecontrol in the refrigerator.
